$$$$$ public static void load() { findPattern = Jext.getProperty("find"); replacePattern = Jext.getProperty("replace"); useRegexp = Jext.getBooleanProperty("useregexp"); ignoreCase = Jext.getBooleanProperty("ignorecase"); script = Jext.getBooleanProperty("replacescript"); pythonScript = Jext.getProperty("pythonscript"); } public static void save() { Jext.setProperty("find", findPattern); Jext.setProperty("replace", replacePattern); Jext.setProperty("pythonscript", pythonScript); Jext.setProperty("ignorecase", ignoreCase ? "on" : "off"); Jext.setProperty("useregexp", useRegexp ? "on" : "off"); Jext.setProperty("replacescript", script ? "on" : "off"); }
